Text.val: // program handles bookings to file for external ledger in PL
15.11.2012 AS SCR#17691 fixed form output with expressions where attribute was ANSI instead of Unicode
29.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 for file conversion from UTF-8 to BU default encoding
26.10.2012 SH SCR17619 Skip second GB723 argument
11.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
30.07.2009 AS SCR#14769 removed ENV_ logical names
-- 14.12.2007 SH SCR13217 Step3 Added LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO to ASCII output
//10.08.2004 SH SCR6739 Step 3 Extended printing with "or field 7 <> 0"
//07-01-2004 JP SCR #5220 implement changes for printing ledger no
//18-12-2003 JP SCR #5083 only print ASCII line if amount<>0
//09-12-2003 JP SCR #4924 new program BAD150PL (copy from BAD150)
//05-JUN-2003 AS SCR#3697 disables access check (UFB533 param#6)
//convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format
//05-JUN-2003 AS, only if BAD150 does not run on Windows!
//copy file BAD150L from new special folder to original
//copy file BAD150C from new special folder to original
NO records for this ADMNO to print so update flag separately
check if printing is allowed for at least one row
//only write LGCD rows if no client rows exist
only write a line if PASSCHANGESTOEXTERNALGL = 'Y'

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('No corresponding ledger number for this administration number ')&Str ({0,2},'#4')&' , '&Str ({0,3},'#9')

Text.val: //Step 2: ASCII file with totals per ledger number
//Step 3: ASCII file with totals per client
... extract admin/client number for client file
